alert.note: Alert for Coeur d'Alene Area; Idaho Palouse; Lewis and Southern Nez Perce Counties; Lewiston Area (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 09 at 10:25PM MST until January 10 at 1:00AM MST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT PST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Southwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. * WHERE...Tekoa, Gifford, Uniontown, Peck, Plummer, Cheney, Lapwai, Worley, Fairfield, Pullman, Spokane Valley, Genesee, Soldiers Meadow Road, Hayden, La Crosse, Lewiston, Kamiah, Moscow, Downtown Spokane, Oakesdale, Rockford, Colfax, Coeur d`Alene, Rosalia, Culdesac, Airway Heights, Davenport, Winchester, Nezperce, Lewiston Grade, Post Falls, Potlatch, and Craigmont. * WHEN...Until midnight PST tonight. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution.

area.areaDesc: Coeur d'Alene Area; Idaho Palouse; Lewis and Southern Nez Perce Counties; Lewiston Area
